availability.title: Open to new opportunities
availability.text: Available for freelance & side projects – contact via email.

about.headline: State of Mind
about.paragraph1: I think in systems and shapes – with a fascination for technology and design that started early.
about.paragraph2: While studying computer science, I continue to develop my 3D skills autodidactically – through projects, tutorials and trial & error.
about.paragraph3: For me, creativity and logical precision belong together. I don’t just want to use tools – I want to understand, shape and rethink.

logic.headline: Logical Side
logic.paragraph:
IT is the foundation of the future. Automation and AI are transforming workflows – and expanding what humans can achieve.

I develop in Java, C, and Python – with a focus on object-oriented software architecture and modern frameworks like Spring, React, and Angular.

I'm driven to understand the principles behind technologies – to actively shape the digital future.

creative.headline: Creative Side
creative.paragraph:
3D design is my creative space for digital worlds. Inspired by Ghibli, I started with Blender – and expanded my toolkit with Cinema 4D and Marvelous Designer.

I'm fascinated by the fusion of technology and design: procedural textures, precise modeling, and systemic thinking in the creative process.

On social media, I share progress – to make my style visible and grow continuously.

aboutPage.headline: About Me
aboutPage.greetingText: Scroll down to learn more about me and my journey!

section1.paragraph1: I've always been driven by technical curiosity – with the ambition to not just use systems, but to understand them in depth.
section1.paragraph2: Between computer science and 3D design, I’ve found two worlds where analytical thinking and creative expression perfectly complement each other.
section1.paragraph3: From the beginning, my goal was clear: to develop digital skills not superficially, but deeply and in a practical way.

section2.paragraph1: Early on, I taught myself 3D design – through online courses, real-world projects, and constant experimentation.
section2.paragraph2: At the same time, I deepened my IT expertise through academic studies focused on programming, systems thinking, and software architecture.
section2.paragraph3: I believe true strength comes from combining technical precision with visual thinking – to improve systems, not just operate them.

section3.paragraph1: In every project, I strive to grow both professionally and conceptually – through system-level understanding and methodical thinking.
section3.paragraph2: In an increasingly AI-driven and digitalized world, I see it as my responsibility to contribute mindfully and create sustainable solutions.
section3.paragraph3: What motivates me is the balance between logic and creativity – with the aim of merging technology and design into a coherent whole.

section1.headline: Developed through consistent self-study
section1.paragraph1: In search of a creative balance to my analytical side, I discovered Blender through my fascination with Studio Ghibli.
section1.paragraph2: The blend of technology and aesthetics captivated me immediately – especially procedural textures, physics-based shading, and the construction of realistic scenes through targeted lighting and camera composition.
section1.paragraph3: Through online courses, tutorials, and hands-on projects, I developed a deep understanding of 3D visualization with design precision.

section2.headline: YouTube videos / Web courses:
section2.paragraph1: Focus on photorealistic rendering, shader workflows, cinematic camera movement, and procedural material systems – from the concept phase to the final render.
section2.paragraph2: In-depth exploration of motion design, product visualization, Redshift, and stylized animations for brand-oriented 3D projects.
section2.paragraph3: Cloth simulation based on physically accurate fabric properties, pattern-based tailoring, and realistic fashion visuals with a high level of detail.

project1.title: Project 1: Product Modelling Series
project1.paragraph1: Creation of high-quality 3D visuals for targeted brand communication and implementation of custom client requirements.
project1.paragraph2: Use of overlay textures, compositing, and Blender’s built-in post-processing to control image impact and material depth.
project1.description: Click here to view the project:

project2.title: Project 2: Blenderlifehacks
project2.paragraph1: Development of a visual content identity through precise storytelling, a clear design language, and consistent image composition – aligned with the platform’s visual culture.
project2.paragraph2: Implementation of A/B testing, posting schedules, and targeted format variants to maximize KPIs and organic platform reach.
project2.description: Click here to view the project:

project3.title: Project 3: 3D Brand Projects
project3.paragraph1: Creation of high-end 3D visuals for targeted brand messaging and fulfillment of individual client needs.
project3.paragraph2: Combining customer-centric communication and visual storytelling to develop designs that are both aesthetically and strategically effective.
project3.description: Click here to view the project:

future.headline: Now
future.paragraph1: In the future, I aim to use my 3D visuals in client projects – focusing on the intersection of CGI and live-action.
future.paragraph2: I'm especially interested in combining Blender with motion tracking and compositing tools like After Effects to merge real footage with 3D elements and create immersive visuals.
future.paragraph3: At the same time, I pursue a strong educational approach via Instagram – aiming to make complex topics like simulation, particle effects, and procedural systems in Blender accessible and understandable.
future.paragraph4: My goal: to prepare technical knowledge in a way that makes it practically applicable – for beginners and pros alike.

section1.content1: Programming I–III (Java, including web development) (2023–2024)
section1.content2: Computer Architecture and Computer Networks (Computer Systems) (2023–2024)
section1.content3: Database Systems, Programming in C, and Fundamentals of Data Science (2023)

section2.content1: At Heinrich Heine University, I deepened my Java skills through the use of modern frameworks and tools.
section2.content2: I strengthened my understanding of the software lifecycle, solved problems independently, documented clearly, and worked collaboratively – open to legacy code, innovation, and continuous improvement.

section3.content1: In addition to my studies, I went a step further by seeking out practical learning formats.
section3.content2: From YouTube tutorials to high-quality Udemy courses – I expanded my knowledge in a structured way, focusing on logical thinking, system understanding, and real developer practice.
section3.content3: I applied what I learned directly in personal projects – from small web applications to more complex backend structures.
section3.content4: During this, I practiced clean code, version control with Git, and debugging in realistic scenarios – with the goal of not just understanding, but implementing professionally.

section4.content1: FullStack Web Development: React, Angular, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Web3, DApps
section4.content2: Machine Learning & Deep Learning with Python: Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, PyTorch, TensorFlow
section4.content3: Data Structures & Algorithms, Linux concepts, and advanced-level system understanding.

project1.title: Project 1: Building an AI system for data analysis (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
project1.paragraph1: – Development of robust data pipelines and deep understanding of complex machine learning models to extract relevant patterns from large, heterogeneous datasets.
project1.paragraph2: – Efficient use of TensorFlow and PyTorch for implementing, optimizing, and validating neural networks considering training time, overfitting, and model generalization.

project2.title: Project 2: Personal Web Portfolio (CSS, HTML, JavaScript)
project2.paragraph1: – Technically precise implementation of a modular frontend with responsive design, component-based architecture, and consistent UI/UX strategy.
project2.paragraph2: – Deep dive into TypeScript typing and structured state handling to ensure maintainability and scalability.

project3.title: Project 3: REST API with Spring Boot (Spring (Boot), Java, JUnit, REST)
project3.paragraph1: – Architecture of a REST-compliant API with thoughtful domain model, exception handling, and persistent data integration via Spring Data JPA.
project3.paragraph2: – Test-driven development with JUnit and integration tests to ensure stability, error resilience, and clean interfaces.

future.headline: Now
future.paragraph5: In the near future, I plan to dive deeply into modern technologies and programming languages. This includes:
future.paragraph6: Rust: Focus on memory and thread safety without a garbage collector
future.paragraph7: Golang: Efficient, lightweight language for scalable backend services
future.paragraph8: TypeScript: A superset of JavaScript with static typing for robust and maintainable code
future.paragraph9: Additionally, I want to expand my knowledge in cloud computing with Azure and AWS, and learn automation frameworks like Selenium.

section1.paragraph1: With a deep understanding of brand aesthetics and visual impact, I independently developed high‑quality 3D visualizations for precise brand communication.
section1.paragraph2: Through intensive reverse engineering of real‑world advertising campaigns — from product photography to studio lighting — I mastered techniques to authentically replicate image composition, material language and lighting scenarios.
section1.paragraph3: The focus was on perfect alignment of modeling, texturing and compositing, enhanced by strategic use of overlay textures and post‑processing to deliver depth, tactility and visual relevance.

section2.paragraph1: This self‑directed learning process was not only technically but also conceptually profound.
section2.paragraph2: I analyzed brand identities, developed my own visual concepts and built a structured design pipeline — from the initial sketch on paper to the final rendered shot.
section2.paragraph3: Key elements such as lighting, camera optics (shutter, bokeh, noise), material behavior (e.g. glass, paper) and emotional storytelling through scene composition were at the core of each project.
section2.paragraph4: This intensive engagement—over many hours each day—shaped my ability to strategically stage products and technically realize creative visions.

section1.paragraph1: By founding Blenderlifehacks, I crafted a standalone content strategy that merges didactic clarity with a bold visual language, inspired by Feynman’s principle that true mastery comes from teaching.
section1.paragraph2: Identifying a gap for easily digestible procedural texture tutorials, I designed a precise format, built custom layouts in Photoshop and iteratively refined a distinctive visual style.

section2.paragraph1: I tailored the visual identity and storytelling perfectly to platform aesthetics—aiming for organic growth, high retention and effective knowledge transfer.
section2.paragraph2: Through methodical A/B testing and a consistent posting cadence, I maximized engagement and grew a community of over 75,000 followers with 250,000+ monthly interactions.
section2.paragraph3: I built scalable content pipelines covering research, scriptwriting, AI‑enhanced audio, editing and post‑production).

section1.paragraph1: Entering brand‑driven projects marked a deliberate shift from solo creation to client‑focused collaboration, aiming to deliver premium 3D visuals that are both aesthetically striking and strategically impactful. Under real project conditions, I developed competencies in adaptive workflows, targeted revision cycles, and structured production pipelines.
section1.paragraph2: I established clear processes—from concept development through modeling, texturing, and animation to post‑production in Premiere Pro—and honed my presentation skills through client feedback and effective pitch techniques, enabling me to translate brand identity into compelling visuals.

section2.paragraph1: These brand collaborations focused on skill reflection, networking, and strategic positioning within the industry. Through consistent self‑initiative, I learned to manage high‑pressure situations, implement feedback productively, and run efficient project cycles.
section2.paragraph2: Simultaneously, I explored the synergy of 3D and AI as a future‑proof synthesis. I plan to integrate local AI models into my workflow—as efficiency boosters, not replacements of creative processes—while maintaining a focus on high‑quality visuals and clear brand messaging.

section1.paragraph1: For my personal web portfolio, I built a modular frontend combining responsive design, component‑based architecture and a consistent UI/UX strategy.
section1.paragraph2: Each module was precisely implemented in HTML, CSS and JavaScript and tested across viewports for accessibility and performance.

section2.paragraph1: Diving into TypeScript typing and structured state management, I applied interfaces, generics and state‑management patterns for maintainability and scalability.
section2.paragraph2: To ensure quality, I integrated comprehensive unit tests, linting rules and automated build processes—keeping the codebase robust and ready for team collaboration.
